text: One of the most important dimensions for fitting pants isn't on the label. When it comes to clothing, men have a fairly simple sizing system. Take pants, for example : We get to choose inseam length and waist size. Many women, whose logic - defying sizing system goes all the way down to size 0, would consider us lucky. The problem is, like women, men ’ s bodies come in all shapes and sizes, and our trusty length / waist measurements aren ’ t always the best way to determine if something fits properly. For pants, one of the most important aspects of fit is rise. This article explains what rise is, how it ’ s measured and why it shouldn ’ t be overlooked.
